CustomField.formula: CASE(Stage__c, "New", IMAGE( "/resource/GreenDot","GreenDot",24,24), "MTTR", IMAGE( "/resource/RedDot","RedDot",24,24), "Urgent", IMAGE( "/resource/RedDot","RedDot",24,24), "Customer Escalated", IMAGE( "/resource/RedDot","RedDot",24,24), "Internally Escalate", IMAGE( "/resource/RedDot","RedDot",24,24), "Today", IMAGE( "/resource/OrangeDot","OrangeDot",24,24), "Action Today", IMAGE( "/resource/OrangeDot","OrangeDot",24,24), "Tomorrow", IMAGE( "/resource/YellowDot","YellowDot",24,24), "Closed", IMAGE( "/resource/BlackDot","BlackDot",24,24), "In Progress", IMAGE( "/resource/BlueDot","BlueDot",24,24), "Waiting On Contractor", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Waiting On Customer", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Waiting On Manager", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Waiting On Vendor", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Waiting On Tech", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Waiting On PC", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Awaiting Quote", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Pending COI", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Reschedule", IMAGE( "/resource/GreenDot","GreenDot",24,24), "Cancellation", IMAGE( "/resource/GreyDot","GreyDot",24,24), "Admin", IMAGE( "/resource/PurpleDot","PurpleDot",24,24), "Follow Up", IMAGE( "/resource/PurpleDot","PurpleDot",24,24), "Needs To Be Scheduled", IMAGE( "/resource/DullDot","DullDot",24,24), "Waiting On Comcast Acceptance", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Shipping Address Within 1 Hour", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Tech Concern - Urgent", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Checked", IMAGE( "/resource/BlueDot","BlueDot",24,24), "Waiting On Director", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "SEV 1", IMAGE( "/resource/RedDot","RedDot",24,24), "SEV 2", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "SEV 3", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "SEV 4", IMAGE( "/resource/YellowDot","YellowDot",24,24), "SEV 5", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), "Lift Required", IMAGE( "/resource/PinkDot","PinkDot",24,24), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Code color based on the stage of the case
CustomField.label: Code
